context.fastmatterAttributes: {"id":"f196ce","name":"Video element description track","rule_type":"atomic","description":"This rule checks that description tracks that come with non-streaming `video` elements are descriptive.\n","accessibility_requirements":null,"input_aspects":["DOM Tree","CSS Styling","Audio output","Visual output"],"authors":["Wilco Fiers","Brian Bors"]}
